channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Japan to import Ford’s huge F-150 pickup trucks
item.description: Confusion hangs over details of a trade deal struck between the U.S. and Japan, sparking concern over its enforcement, particularly regarding cars.

item.title: WM CEO Jim Fish on sustainability in the waste, recycling, and landfill industry

item.title: Gen Z dropouts could be your future boss: 20-something year olds without degrees are leading the charge in side gigs

item.title: Trump’s threatened 40% tariff on ‘transshipped’ goods tries to target China and its manufacturing strength
item.description: Analysts say Washington likely wants to develop supply chains that are less reliant on China.
